name: T.G. Wonder Magician
text:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "T.G." monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: Target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy that target. If this card on the field is destroyed: Draw 1 card. During your opponent's Main Phase, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using this card you control (this is a Quick Effect).
